oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Some further properties of homogeneous immittance polynomials
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SHANKAR, K
RAMACHANDRAN, V
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: immittance polynomials
prfs
mprf
hips
hmprfs
quadratic form
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this paper, some of the theorems of homogeneous immittance polynomials are discussed. Ratio of consecutive terms of such polynomials will be a homogeneous multivariable positive real function. Yet another theorem deals with decomposition of homogeneous immittance polynomials. Necessary and sufficient conditions for such a decomposition have been proved.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF THE INSTITUTION OF ELECTRONICS AND TELECOMMUNICATION ENGINEERS, 41(5-6), 273-276
